field.name: fRecoveryTimeMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on the speed at which the weapon recovers from recoil

field.name: fAchieveTimeMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplier on the time to achieve the recoil

field.name: fIronsightRecoilMultiplier
field.desc: A multiplier to be applied to the weapon's recoil when in ironsight

field.name: fYOffsetMultiplier
field.desc: A multiplier on the y offset of the recoil.

field.name: fMaxYMultiplier
field.desc: A multiplier on the max y offset of the recoil.

field.name: fIronsightYOffsetMultiplier
field.desc: A multiplier on the y offset of the recoil.

field.name: fIronsightMaxYMultiplier
field.desc: A multiplier on the max y offset of the recoil.

field.name: fYOffsetRecoveryTimeMultiplier
field.desc: A multiplier on the recovery time just for the y offset.
